Really, it's a sad story for all involved, especially because the Little Shrimp serves such delicious food, which includes the best shrimp in the world.

She is glowing because she has Mana. And with her Mana, she discovers that she can use it to create a sword. She uses her sword to defeat the aliens, and she also uses it to free Kyoji.

When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. Unfortunately for the aliens, humans are the only ones who can wield it. And Mana is incredibly powerful. In fact, it's one of the most effective ways to get rid of aliens, because it can be used to create weapons that are capable of destroying them. 

The aliens are fearful once they realize that humans are getting their Mana back. Mana is the only thing that can destroy them. Aliens are very resistant and resilient creatures, meaning they can survive floods, fire, and even nuclear war. But the one thing they cannot survive, not even a little bit, is Mana.

They believe she will be the one to use Mana for the good of humankind. And apparently her parents were right about that, because Mana is the one who ends up defeating the aliens. When Mana is sixteen years old, she gets a job as a waitress at a restaurant called the Little Shrimp. The Little Shrimp is a popular restaurant, and it is owned by a man named Kyoji. Kyoji is a very kind and generous man, and he is also a very good friend of Mana's parents. One day, the aliens attack the Little Shrimp. They take Kyoji hostage, and they also hold all of Kyoji's inventory hostage. This means that customers cannot get any food or drinks from the Little Shrimp. Really, it's a sad story for all involved, especially because the Little Shrimp serves such delicious food, which includes the best shrimp in the world.

But Mana is determined to save the Little Shrimp and is even more determined to save Kyoji. She discovers that she has Mana, because while looking for Kyoji she realizes that her body is glowing. She is glowing because she has Mana. And with her Mana, she discovers that she can use it to create a sword. She uses her sword to defeat the aliens, and she also uses it to free Kyoji.

Kyoji is incredibly grateful to Mana. He is so grateful, in fact, that he offers to let her work at the Little Shrimp and get free meals whenever she wants them. Mana is very happy to accept this offer, because she loves the Little Shrimp's food. But she also loves the Little Shrimp's atmosphere. The Little Shrimp is a very happy place, and it's a place where everyone is welcome. It's a place where people can go to have fun, and it's a place where people can go to relax.
